title: WTB: Harry Lord/Jake Stahl T3 Turkey Reds!
author: scotty21690

posts.post_title: WTB: Harry Lord/Jake Stahl T3 Turkey Reds!
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am looking for low grade 1911 T3 Turkey Reds of Jake Stahl and/or Harry Lord as I am attempting the Red Sox team set [minus Speaker, for now]. 

If you have one you are willing to sell contact me at: [url]scottmrobichaud2008@hotmail.com[/url] or shoot me a private message and I will get back to you as soon as possible.


Thanks in advance!

-Scott
